pullRequest.title: Move srv_organization_credentials to core features
pullRequest.bodyText:
What does this PR change?
Move srv_organization_credentials into core features.
Synchronize SCC earlier: at srv_sync_channels instead of srv_sync_products.


testsuite/features/reposync/srv_sync_channels.feature:
Synchronize SCC here.


testsuite/features/reposync/srv_sync_products.feature:
Drop the SCC synch; it is already executed in the previous feature.


testsuite/run_sets/secondary_parallelizable.yml


testsuite/run_sets/core.yml:


Links
https://github.com/SUSE/spacewalk/issues/12007
Ports

Manager-4.0: https://github.com/SUSE/spacewalk/pull/12778
Manager-4.1: https://github.com/SUSE/spacewalk/pull/12779

Changelogs
If you don't need a changelog check, please mark this checkbox:

 No changelog needed

If you uncheck the checkbox after the PR is created, you will need to re-run changelog_test (see below)

nodes.bodyText:
Re-add this comment here?
    # Order matters here, refresh first
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -8,7 +8,8 @@ Feature: Be able to list available channels and enable them
 
 @scc_credentials
   Scenario: List available channels
-    When I execute mgr-sync "list channels -e" with user "admin" and password "admin"
+    When I refresh SCC

afterCommit.message:
Move srv_organization_credentials to core features

Synchronize SCC earlier.
See spacewalk#12007

- testsuite/features/reposync/srv_sync_channels.feature:
  Synchronize SCC here.
- testsuite/features/reposync/srv_sync_products.feature:
  Drop the SCC synch; it is already executed in the previous feature.

- testsuite/run_sets/secondary_parallelizable.yml
- testsuite/run_sets/core.yml:
Move the feature to its YAML file.
